description: Retention of air conditioning condenser unit located to the rear of the building, the replacement of a rear window at ground floor level and internal alterations.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 15003-005 (Rev: B).  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The rating noise level emitted from the external plant hereby approved, as assessed under BS4142: 1997, shall be lower than the existing background noise level by at least 5 dBA as measured at 3.5 m from the nearest sensitive facade and 1m from upper floor noise sensitive facades, during the relevant periods of operation. Reason: In the interests of the amenity of occupants of nearby noise sensitive uses, and in accordance the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policy 7A, policies 1.1(j) of the Adopted Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2012 and London Plan (2015) policy 7.15.
